centerName: Department of Plant Sciences, University of Cambridge
title: UVM4-T12::pHyg3
description: Insertional mutant obtained by transforming UVM4::pAS_R1 (UVM4-T12) with plasmid pHyg3 containing a hygromycin resistance gene (aphVII) under the control of the constitutively expressed b2-tubulin promoter.

attributes.value: Tris-acetate phosphate (TAP) medium with Kropat's trace elements (Kropat et al., 2011) but excluding selenium. Paromomycin 5-20 �g/ml, hygromycin 10-20 �g/ml. 25�C under a continuous or 16 h / 8 h light / dark cycle (shaking speed of 120 rpm, light intensity of 90 �E/(m^2*s^1)
Under natural light at room temperature
